title: Xbox Partner Preview Review
description:
Did it live up to the "hype"? 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Phm9_CwM3SQ 

New World Aeternum is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC! Get it here: https://bit.ly/3XROcCT
